Research Methods for Business Students [Paperback]
Mark Saunders (Author), Adrian Thornhill (Author), Philip Lewis (Author)

A comprehensive introduction to research methods in business for students planning or undertaking a dissertation or extensive research project in business and management.

The fifth edition of Research Methods for Business Students brings the theory, philosophy and techniques of research to life and enables students to understand the practical relevance of the research methods.
